text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: Raskolnikov, troubled, urban street>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: "A percentage... how coldly scientific."

Raskolnikov: "What if Dounia is part of it?"

---

<setup: Raskolnikov, lost in thought>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: "Where am I going again?"

Raskolnikov: "Razumihin... why did I think of him?"

Raskolnikov: "Curious... I barely have friends."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reflects on the societal acceptance of moral decay and his own isolation from peers while contemplating a visit to Razumihin.
